document_data.caption: A map showing Olaim's Cut and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Olaim's Cut
document_data.mainbody: '''Olaim's Cut''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Olaim's Cut was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. It ran east to west, connecting [[Caravan Street]] in the west with [[Wall Street]] in the east near the outer city wall. An unnamed alley branched off the southern side of Olaim's Cut.
document_data.Notable Locations: [[Thauntle's Good Heels and Soles]] sat on the north side of Olaim's Cut.{{cite web/Waterdeep News/South Ward Cobbler Finds Rubies}}
